short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the title and URL from a Chrome tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to copy the titles and URLs of multiple tabs selected in Chrome or Edge.

You can also copy titles and URLs in markdown format.

You can also paste multiple URLs copied to the clipboard to open them in a new tab.

### Menu Item
- Title \n URL
- Markdown Style [Title](URL)
- Title
- URL
- Paste URLs

### Copy Option 1
- Title: Delete contents of round brackets (*) Title -> Title
- Title: Delete square brackets [*] Title -> * Title
- Title: Delete after delimiter [ -  ] [ · ] [ – ] [ | ]
- URL: Delete Parameter after[?]

### Copy Option 2
- Title: Replace Space Zenkaku to Hankaku (Japanese Space Char type)
- Title: Remove Username On GitHub PR
- Title: Remove Answer's On Quora (English and Japanese)
- URL: Short Amazon (.com and .co.jp)
- URL: No Encode Japanese
